overview: Min-min is a business partner and sex partner with Tae-jun, the president of the business. Tae-jun's son, Jun-ho, meets by chance, falls in love with Min-joo, and the two marry despite her father's objection. Tae-joon can't forget Min-joo, who became her daughter-in-law. She asks her daughter-in-law to have sex, but she refuses. When Jun-ho's business becomes difficult, Min-joo asks his father-in-law Tae-joon for money on behalf of her husband, and Tae-joon uses this as an opportunity to claim the body of Min-joo...
title: Affair: pretty daughter-in-law
